abstract: Anna Skladmann grew up hearing "sparkling stories" of life in elite Russia. Years later, she discovered it for herself - in an unexpected demographic.
snippet: Anna Skladmann grew up hearing "sparkling stories" of life in elite Russia. Years later, she discovered it for herself - in an unexpected demographic.
lead_paragraph: The 25-year-old photographer Anna Skladmann had to be patient when dealing with some of the subjects of her long-term portrait series, "Little Adults." They had people to see and places to be.

headline.main: Men and Women of a Certain (Privileged) Age
